title: Furnished sunny home steps from U Penn, CHOP (utilities included!)
description:
Fully-furnished 2 bedroom, 2 full bath house for rent on quiet tree-lined street in one of Philly's most desirable neighborhoods, Fitler Square. Available August 1st for short-term lease of 3 to 6 months. Walking distance to Penn, Rittenhouse Square and Art Museum. 1/4 mile from Schuylkill River Park and the Schuylkill Banks Boardwalk.
Rent $4,000 per month includes water, gas, electric, internet, ADT alarm system, monthly professional cleaning, and seasonal windowbox service. Subject to background and credit check. Unit fully furnished, kitchen stocked, linens and towels included. Perfect for travel nurse, medical student/resident on an away rotation, or anyone in town needing somewhere to stay while you renovate your place!
House includes:
- Exposed brick wall
- Brand new quartz kitchen countertops
- Central air conditioning
- Lots of natural sunlight
- Open first floor plan
- Gas fireplace
- Private back patio
- Finished basement
- Washer/Dryer
- Walk-in-closet in front bedroom
- Updated appliances
- Storage room
Neighborhood Highlights:
- E-bikes, Grocery Store, Dry Cleaners, Restaurants, Preschool and Elementary School, Public Pool, Playground, Running Path and Dog Park all within 1/4 mile radius
- 1/2 mile from all of University of Pennsylvania, Children's Hospital of Philadelphia (CHOP) & Hospital of The University of Pennsylvania (HUP)
Dogs considered on a case by case basis. No cats.

title: Newly Renovated 2 bed Apts
description:
Located at 41st and Spruce, this building was recently upgraded with new floors, new stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, in-wall AC/heat unit in every room, and floor to ceiling tiling in the bathrooms with heated ceiling lights. We have just started renting the building and about half of the units so far are occupied by grads and young professionals. The available units left are the 2 bed apartments, renting at $2500 - $2800/mo depending on the unit (ie one of them has its own private backyard, another unit has 2 bathrooms, etc). All units have spacious living rooms, lots of light, and sizable bedrooms. The appliances still have the stickers on them; everything top to bottom in each unit is brand new.
Location is in the heart of UPenn, and walking distance to public transportation, parks and restaurants.
Our final round of showings will end August 1. If interested, please contact us asap to schedule your viewing.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. title: Your search is over. Welcome home!
description: Welcome to 306 Headhouse Court, a nicely updated end unit townhome in the sought after Ridings neighborhood of beautiful Chesterbrook. The first floor offers a tiled entrance foyer with a step down to the living room/dining area, highlighted by a wood burning fireplace with a handsome tile surround. The gorgeously renovated kitchen offers gleaming granite countertops, raised panel cabinetry, pendant lighting, stainless steel appliances, a stainless steel sink and tile flooring. French doors off the kitchen open to an enclosed sunroom with tile flooring leading to the community common area. A nice powder room and laundry room complete the picture for the first level of the home. The master suite features a walk in California closet, a double closet, sliding glass doors to a rear balcony and an updated master bathroom with tile flooring and subway tile surrounding the tub/shower. Unique to this home is the terrific home office/den off the master suite, the perfect spot for those who will be working more from home. An open floor plan, great storage and closet space, recessed lighting and a premium location all combine to make this a fantastic place to call home. This is a rare opportunity to rent a nicely finished townhome at a great price in a very high demand location. Located close to the shops, trains and corporate centers of The Main Line. All of this plus the top ranked, award winning Tredyffrin-Easttown School District. Your search is over. Welcome home!

title: Spacious 3BR Townhome on Quiet Street in Pennsport
description:
119 Titan Street
Philadelphia, PA 19147
*Pet Friendly
Large 3-story, 3 bedroom townhouse/row on a quiet street in the vibrant Pennsport neighborhood of Philadelphia.  This spacious home is located close to restaurants, shopping, movies, schools/churches and transportation, with easy access to Center City, major highways (I-95, I-76, Delaware Avenue, etc.) and bridges (Ben Franklin and Walt Whitman).
1st Floor consists of an open floor plan with spacious living room, large dining room, and separate kitchen.  Living room and dining room contain oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings and chair rail throughout.  The large bright kitchen includes maple cabinets, counter, sink, appliances (including gas range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and built-in microwave), tile floor, crown molding and chair rail.  The sunny kitchen leads out to a private, enclosed back yard/patio with 6 foot wall surrounding it.
2nd Floor consists of large Master bedroom with 2 closets and original wood floors.  The large renovated bathroom with full tub is located just off of the Master bedroom.  In addition, there is a “Bonus Room” on this floor that could be used as an office or large walk-in closet.
3rd Floor consists of 2 bedrooms each with ample closet space and original wood floors
Finally, there is a large basement (unfinished) that includes washer/dryer plus tons of additional storage space.
SUMMARY:
•	3 bedrooms + bonus room (office or large walk-in closet)
•	Large renovated bathroom with full-size tub
•	Spacious living room and dining room with oak hardwood flooring, crown moldings, and chair rail throughout
•	Bright, sunny, renovated kitchen with gas range, dishwasher, and built-in microwave
•	Large, private, enclosed brick patio/backyard
•	Ample closet space and basement storage
•	Washer/dryer
•	Convenient location
*Pet Friendly – Up to 2 cats or dogs permitted with additional security deposit of ½ month’s rent
$2100/month + utilities
Available September 1, 2022

title: Luxury living in Society Hill
description: Luxury living in Society Hill community awaits in this 4 Bedroom, 2 ½ bath townhome with ALL THE AMENITIES. All the many charms of Queen Village & Society Hill and just steps from the newly improved HEADHOUSE PLAZA. Meet grandeur from the moment you walk through the door, with 18 FT CEILINGS in your formal dining room and elegant HARDWOOD FLOORS THROUGHOUT. The “Chef’s Kitchen” with QUARTZ COUNTERTOPS, SHAKER CABINETS and top-of-the-line Viking,Subzero STAINLESS APPLIANCES, also has a pass through window/ kitchen bar for open sightlines and easy entertaining. Move into a spectacular living room featuring a wood-burning fireplace that opens to a large private rear patio that exits to your SECURED/GATED PARKING. The sizeable master suite offers generous custom California walk in closet and a chicly remodeled EN-SUITE BATH with QUARTZ-TOPPED DOUBLE VANITY and large double walk-in shower. A 3rd floor terrace with garden views lays just beyond the laundry closet and 2 more well-sized bedrooms with ample closet space and share the 2nd full newly remodeled bath with tub/shower combo & quartz topped vanity. Possibilities abound on the lower level starting with a full-service wet bar, a styled up powder room and plentiful storage. Whether your preference is a media/ billiard room, office, 4th bedroom or a gym, there is definitely bonus space to work with! Aside from superior proximity to restaurants, shops, errands and parks, I-95 is just 2 minutes away for easier commutes. Home also uses Meredith schools. Pets allowed on a case-by case basis and will include an additional deposit. Owner is a licensed PA salesperson.

Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: located on a quiet block in the heart of northern liberties
description:
This is an amazing home located on a quiet block in the heart of northern liberties, just around the corner from the piazza and liberties walk, and steps away from dozens of neighborhood restaurants including apricot stone, el camino real, hikari sushi and urban village brewing company. Upon entering you will notice the open and inviting floor plan. The first floor has hardwood flooring, high ceilings , a bathroom, a gas fireplace, and a piano. Light pours through the kitchen from the backyard through a glass door that leads to an outdoor city oasis, including a patio and grass! The basement has a custom bar and pool table for entertaining. Venturing upstairs to the 2nd floor, you will find a cozy back bedroom and large front bedroom with a renovated bathroom, a front-loading washer and dryer, and large walk-in closet. The 3rd floor features a large home office that could double as an extra bedroom. French doors open into the primary bedroom, which boasts large closet space, hardwood flooring, and a fully renovated bath with dual shower heads. The home is full of character, with custom built-ins and solid wood doors, and has been featured in design home, nest, apartment therapy, and philadelphia magazine. The home has a nest thermostat and adt security set up. There is permit parking on the block, neighborhood favorite one shot cafe on the corner, and both heirloom market and acme only a block away!
213 w george st
